title: 崩溃求助
author: chen0818
txt_content:
[15:20:09] [Client thread/WARN]: Ambiguity between arguments [teleport, destination] and [teleport, targets] with inputs: [Player, 0123, @e, dd12be42-52a9-4a91-a8a1-11c01849e498]
[15:20:09] [Client thread/WARN]: Ambiguity between arguments [teleport, location] and [teleport, destination] with inputs: [0.1 -0.5 .9, 0 0 0]
[15:20:09] [Client thread/WARN]: Ambiguity between arguments [teleport, location] and [teleport, targets] with inputs: [0.1 -0.5 .9, 0 0 0]
[15:20:09] [Client thread/WARN]: Ambiguity between arguments [teleport, targets] and [teleport, destination] with inputs: [Player, 0123, dd12be42-52a9-4a91-a8a1-11c01849e498]
[15:20:09] [Client thread/WARN]: Ambiguity between arguments [teleport, targets, location] and [teleport, targets, destination] with inputs: [0.1 -0.5 .9, 0 0 0]
[15:20:29] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Is the server overloaded? Running 2107ms or 42 ticks behind
[15:20:33] [Client thread/FATAL]: Unreported exception thrown!
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

replies.txt_content:
[15:20:29] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Is the server overloaded? Running 2107ms or 42 ticks behind
你的伺服器过载了，尝试增大分配给伺服端的RAM吧，如果多分配还是不能解决问题，说明你的CPU承载不了这个端。
或者你把启动参数发出来看看，是不是有哪些地方没有设定好呢？

replies.author: chen0818
replies.txt_content:
1262075572 发表于 2018-8-23 20:30
你的伺服器过载了，尝试增大分配给伺服端的RAM吧，如果多分配还是不能解决问题，说明你的CPU承载不了这个 ...
如何做到增大分配给伺服端的RAM......

replies.author: chen0818
replies.txt_content:
chen0818 发表于 2018-8-23 20:35
如何做到增大分配给伺服端的RAM......
HMCL 3.1.94

啊，前面说错了，是增大游戏端的RAM，要增大游戏端的RAM，在这个版本的HMCL中，需要在想修改的版本上点击设定按钮，然后在第二张图的红箭头位置修改RAM值，最好不要超过系统所有RAM的70%，也不要低于768MB. 如果还是无法启动游戏，那么就可能是配置问题或者游戏文件问题，尝试用官方的启动器下载游文件。
